properties.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 4:02AM AKST until January 11 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Plan on difficult travel
conditions. In addition, areas of poor visibility are expected.
Total snow accumulations of up to one inch are expected.

* WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast.

* WHEN...3 PM today to 6 AM Saturday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 45 mph will
cause areas of blowing and drifting snow.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods
of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM AKST SATURDAY
